          <title>
            <string language="en">Conditions that keep the Earth in orbit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedingungen, die die Masse in der Bahn halten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conditions qui maintiennent la terre dans 
l'orbite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circunstâncias que mantêm a terra na órbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circostanze che mantengono la terra in orbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όροι που κρατούν τη γη στην τροχιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Condiciones que mantienen la tierra órbita</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the conditions that keep the Earth in orbit as it moves around the Sun.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Bedingungen, die die 
Masse in der Bahn halten, während sie um die Sonne bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les conditions qui 
maintiennent la terre dans l'orbite pendant qu'elle se déplace autour
du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as circunstâncias que 
mantêm a terra na órbita enquanto se move em torno do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra le circostanze che mantengono
la terra in orbita mentre si muove intorno al sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τους όρους που κρατούν τη
γη στην τροχιά καθώς κινείται γύρω από τον ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las condiciones que 
mantienen la tierra órbita mientras que se mueve alrededor del sol.</string>
          </description>
